title: Urban heat storage mechanism scenarios
source: Synthetic energy-balance simulations calibrated to analysis/results/urban_heat_canopy.json
description: Scenario ledger linking canopy fraction R, adaptive threshold Θ, and storage-driven β shifts across five urban canyon regimes.
preprocessing: Simulated 960 nights per R value using stochastic energy balance
Fitted σ(β(R-Θ)) vs linear/power-law nulls via resonance_fit_pipeline
Aggregated scenario-level diagnostics (θ, β, ΔAIC, safe-night fractions)
